name: Quest
overview: THIS IS DIFFERENT FROM ALL THE OTHER GAMES OF ADVENTURE!! It is played on a computer generated map of Alesia, different every time you run it. You lead a small band of adventurers on a mission to conquer the Citadel of Moorlock,. You have to build an army and then arm and feed them by combat, bargaining, exploration of ruins and temples, and outright banditry! A text only early US game released initially on Cassette.
